MenuCreator

Class MenuFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • MenuCreator.MenuFactory

  • public class MenuFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles which menus need which type of signature based on all the data they are required to display. If they require similar data they are put through a case statement for a more specific menu

    • Method Detail

      • createMenu

        public static Menu createMenu(MenuChoice desiredMenu)
        This method creates menus that require no additional data to be sent to the menu for display.
        Parameters:
        desiredMenu - name from enum to specify specific menu.
        Returns:
        object of desired menu.

      • createMenu

        public static Menu createMenu(MenuChoice desiredMenu,
                              int vehicleId,
                              double price)
        Creates menus that require an id and price(most of the tickets that have singular prices).
        Parameters:
        desiredMenu - name from enum to specify Menu.
        vehicleId - unique vehicle Id.
        price - how much the user will owe when this menu outputs.
        Returns:
        instance of desired menu

      • createMenu

        public static Menu createMenu(int vehicleId,
                              int hours,
                              java.lang.String timeFrame,
                              double price)
        Method to pass and instance the menu for a regular ticket
        Parameters:
        vehicleId - unique id given to vehicle entering garage.
        hours - The total hours a user has spent in the garage so it can be printed on the menu.
        timeFrame - the two times displayed on the tickets to tell the user when they arrived and when they left.
        price - The amount of money owed by the user.
        Returns:
        Menu that displays the users receipt on leaving the garage.

      • createMenu

        public static Menu createMenu(double[] pricesToDisplayAndTotal,
                              int[] ticketsByType)
        Method to pass and instance the menu of the end of day report viewed by garage admin.
        Parameters:
        pricesToDisplayAndTotal - list of all the transactions from throughout the day.
        ticketsByType - Totals of each type of ticket for display on the menu.
        Returns:
        Menu of the end of day report.
